Html.content: • Tomcat's directory listing feature: For ensuring a proper behavior of the static export feature, Tomcat's directory listing feature should be disabled. Since Tomcat 6 it is disabled by default. If you already enabled it, disable it. This can be done in the master ${TOMCAT_HOME}/conf/web.xml configuration file, or for each application in its ${WEBAPP_HOME}/WEB-INF/web.xml configuration file. You just need to set the value of the servlet/init-param/param-value node to false, for both the default servlet and the listings parameter.
